title: Conflict Resolution and Diversity Education Simulation Course for Corporate Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental leadership competencies and organizational management experience
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing conflict case analysis in multicultural settings and deriving actionable resolution strategies

learning_goals: Learners can apply appropriate mediation techniques in conflict situations among team members with diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can analyze conflict resolution processes in real-time through VR simulations and propose improvements incorporating feedback
Learners can formulate concrete implementation plans for promoting organizational diversity and explain them to peer evaluators
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
